analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/10/0xe74d3bfbd4cb4bcfdeaea79f6c47b13feb6a073f.sol#442-443) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0xe74d3bfbd4cb4bcfdeaea79f6c47b13feb6a073f.sol#445-447)
